namespace.name: jdb
namespace.brief: A framework for using ROOT more efficiently.

class.name: ChainLoader
class.brief: Static use class for loading .root files into a TChain

class.name: ConfigPoint
class.brief: Config Point easily loads (x, y) points from XmlConfigs

class.name: ConfigRange
class.brief: ConfigRange easily loads (min -> max) ranges from XmlConfigs

class.name: DataSource
class.brief: Automatically maps tree branches and leaves

class.name: EvaluatedLeaf
class.brief: DataSource leaf evaluated from a function string

class.name: HistoAnalyzer
class.brief: Base class for creating histogram analysis projects

class.name: HistoBook
class.brief: A book keeper and helper for storing and using ROOT histograms

class.name: Logger
class.brief: An all purpose logging utility with log level functionality.

class.name: LoggerConfig
class.brief: A class for creating Loggers from Xml Configs

class.name: TreeAnalyzer
class.brief: Boiler for analyzing data distributed accross TTrees in many files

class.name: XmlConfig
class.brief: Use xml formatted config files easily in projects
